title: These things I still question
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Aboriginal Australians - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Discrimination - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Racism - Australia
abstract: 'Why wasn't he given the opportunities of other white Australians.'
description: Ken Saunders questions the things in his life that he didn't understand, like why his dad was treated differently, why he couldn't play with the white kids and why people just let this happen.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002170; Pitcha this : Stories from the windy wanderers : Digital Storytelling workshop; Active; 2007
